Uses of Class
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.visitors.AeImplTraversingVisitor

Packages that use AeImplTraversingVisitor
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity This package contains classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.visitors Classes that visit a tree of BPEL implementation objects and save or restore their state.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery This package contains classes for recovering or regenerating the state of a process from alarms, messages, or faults that the process received. 
 

Uses of AeImplTraversingVisitor in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity
 

Subclasses of AeImplTraversingVisitor in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity
 class AeLocationPathImplVisitor
          Visits each of the implementation objects and sets a custom location path and id on each object.
 

Uses of AeImplTraversingVisitor in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.visitors
 

Subclasses of AeImplTraversingVisitor in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.visitors
 class AeBaseRestoreVisitor
          Convenience base class for visitors that restore state in implementation objects.
 class AeImplReverseTraversingVisitor
          A visitor that traverses a BPEL implementation object tree.
 class AeInScopeVariableFindingVisitor
          A visitor that finds all variables in scope.
 class AeProcessSnapshotVisitor
          Visits a tree of BPEL implementation objects to collect all versions of all variables and correlation sets that are still live for normal or compensation processing.
 class AeRegisterLocationVisitor
          Visit the objects creating unique ids from process ids and their paths.
 class AeRestoreCompInfoVisitor
          Visits a tree of BPEL implementation objects to restore AeCompInfo objects from an instance of AeRestoreImplState.
 class AeRestoreImplStateVisitor
          Visits a tree of BPEL implementation objects to restore the state from an instance of AeRestoreImplState.
protected static class AeRestoreImplStateVisitor.AeDeadPathVisitor
          Visitor for setting the node and all of its children to dead path.
 class AeSaveImplStateVisitor
          Visit / traverse the impl to save state at each node.
 class AeTerminationStateUpgradeVisitor
          This visitor applies some changes to the process state in order to update the state of the activities to make them consistent with changes made to the termination routine.
 

Uses of AeImplTraversingVisitor in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery
 

Subclasses of AeImplTraversingVisitor in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery
 class AeExecutingLocationIdsCollector
          Determines the location ids for activities that are currently executing by visiting the tree of BPEL implementation objects.
